title: new​
content: </> Logger.new(loggerName: string?) → Logger The default Logger constructor used to create a logger. The default loggerName is "Logger".

title: Start​
content: </> Rayworks.Start( directory: Instance , configuration: RayworksConfiguration? ) → () Starts the framework by recursively requiring all the modules inside the specified directory. If a configuration isn't provided, the default Rayworks configuration will be used. local Rayworks = require(...) Rayworks.Start(ReplicatedStorage.Client)
